O

openCsvExport() - Method in class controller.ProductController
Exports the current list of ingredients to a CSV file.
openCsvImport() - Method in class controller.ProductController
Imports ingredients from a CSV file.
Order - Class in model
Represents an order in the system, containing details about the client, order lines, payment method, and order state.
Order(int, Date, OrderLine, Client) - Constructor for class model.Order
Constructs an Order with a single order line, defaulting to pending state and unpaid method.
Order(int, Date, OrderState, PaymentMethod, List<OrderLine>, Client) - Constructor for class model.Order
Constructs an Order with the specified parameters.
Order(int, Date, OrderState, PaymentMethod, Client) - Constructor for class model.Order
Constructs an Order with the specified parameters, without initial order lines.
Order(Date, OrderState, OrderLine, Client) - Constructor for class model.Order
Constructs an Order with a single order line and a specific state, defaulting to unpaid method.
OrderController - Class in controller
The OrderController class handles operations related to orders and order lines.
OrderController() - Constructor for class controller.OrderController
Constructs a new OrderController instance with no active order.
OrderController(Order) - Constructor for class controller.OrderController
Constructs a new OrderController instance with the specified active order.
OrderControllerTest - Class in test.java
Test class for OrderController.
OrderControllerTest() - Constructor for class test.java.OrderControllerTest
Default constructor for OrderControllerTest.
OrderDao - Interface in controller.db
The OrderDao interface provides methods for interacting with the database regarding orders and order lines.
OrderLine - Class in model
Represents a line item in an order, including the product and its quantity.
OrderLine(int, int) - Constructor for class model.OrderLine
Constructs an OrderLine with the specified identifier and quantity.
OrderLine(int, int, Product) - Constructor for class model.OrderLine
Constructs an OrderLine with the specified identifier, quantity, and product.
OrderLine(int, Product) - Constructor for class model.OrderLine
Constructs an OrderLine with the specified quantity and product.
OrderState - Enum Class in model
Represents the various states of an order in the system.
